movie.title: Iron Man
movie.cast: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard
movie.description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

movie.title: The Dark Knight
movie.cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart
movie.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movie.title: Forrest Gump
movie.cast: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise
movie.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

movie.title: Inception
movie.cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page
movie.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movie.title: The Matrix
movie.cast: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
movie.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movie.title: Pathaan
movie.cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, John Abraham
movie.description: An Indian spy takes on the leader of a group of mercenaries who have nefarious plans to target his homeland.

movie.title: Brahmastra Part One: Shiva
movie.cast: Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, Amitabh Bachchan
movie.description: This is the story of Shiva who sets out in search of love and self-discovery. During his journey, he has to face many evil forces to protect the universe.

movie.title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2
movie.description: When a young man encounters a spirit, he must seek the help of a quirky psychiatrist to solve the mystery of a haunted mansion.

movie.title: Gangubai Kathiawadi
movie.cast: Alia Bhatt, Shantanu Maheshwari, Vijay Raaz
movie.description: The story of Gangubai Kothewali, a powerful woman in the 1960s who rose to prominence in the underworld and politics of Mumbai.

movie.title: Drishyam 2
movie.description: A gripping tale of a man who must protect his family from the consequences of a crime they committed years ago.
